data.name: espresso
data.description: A strong, full-bodied coffee shot made from finely-ground coffee beans.

data.name: latte
data.description: Creamy and rich, made with espresso and steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of foam.

data.name: cappuccino
data.description: A balanced blend of espresso, steamed milk, and thick milk foam.

data.name: macchiato
data.description: A shot of espresso topped with a dollop of frothy steamed milk.

data.name: Flat white
data.description: A velvety coffee with a higher ratio of espresso to steamed milk, topped with a thin layer of microfoam.

data.name: mocha
data.description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

data.name: cortado
data.description: A balanced coffee drink with equal parts espresso and steamed milk.

data.name: americano
data.description: A smooth coffee drink made by diluting espresso with hot water.

data.name: classic cold brew
data.description: Smooth and refreshing, steeped slowly in cold water for a full-bodied flavor.

data.name: Iced americano
data.description: A chilled version of the classic Americano, with espresso and cold water over ice.

data.name: Iced latte
data.description: Espresso combined with chilled milk and served over ice for a creamy, refreshing taste.

data.name: Iced cappuccino
data.description: A frothy iced coffee made with espresso, cold milk, and ice, topped with foam.

data.name: nitro cold brew
data.description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen for a creamy texture and rich, velvety taste.

data.name: iced mocha
data.description: A chilled coffee drink made with espresso, milk, ice, and chocolate syrup.

data.name: iced caramel macchiato
data.description: Layers of espresso, vanilla-flavored milk, and ice, topped with caramel drizzle.

data.name: cold brew lemonade
data.description: A unique blend of cold brew coffee and lemonade, offering a refreshing twist.

data.name: orange juice
data.description: Freshly squeezed, pure orange juice for a refreshing and vitamin-rich drink.

data.name: apple juice
data.description: Crisp and sweet, made from fresh apples for a wholesome beverage.

data.name: lemonade
data.description: Classic lemonade made with real lemons, offering a perfect balance of sweet and tart flavors.

data.name: berry blend juice
data.description: A delicious mix of berries including strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries for a fruity treat.

data.name: tropical punch
data.description: A vibrant blend of tropical fruits such as pineapple, mango, and passionfruit.

data.name: pomegranate juice
data.description: Rich and tangy, made from 100% pomegranate for a healthy boost.

data.name: coconut water
data.description: Naturally hydrating and refreshing, sourced from fresh coconuts.

data.name: green juice
data.description: A nutritious blend of leafy greens, apples, and a hint of lemon for a healthy, revitalizing drink.

data.name: croissant
data.description: A flaky, buttery pastry perfect for pairing with coffee.

data.name: muffin
data.description: Moist and delicious, available in various flavors like blueberry, chocolate chip, and banana nut.

data.name: scone
data.description: A crumbly, slightly sweet pastry, often with fruit or chocolate chips.

data.name: danish
data.description: A sweet pastry with a variety of fillings such as cream cheese, fruit, or almond paste.

data.name: cinnamon roll
data.description: Soft, sweet dough rolled with cinnamon and sugar, topped with icing.

data.name: bagel
data.description: Chewy and versatile, available plain or with toppings like sesame seeds, poppy seeds, and everything seasoning.

data.name: banana bread
data.description: Moist and flavorful, made with ripe bananas and sometimes nuts or chocolate chips.

data.name: pain au chocolat
data.description: A buttery pastry filled with rich chocolate, perfect for a sweet treat.

data.name: chocolate chip cookie
data.description: Classic cookie filled with rich chocolate chips.

data.name: brownie
data.description: Dense and fudgy, perfect for a chocolate lover's treat.

data.name: granola bar
data.description: A healthy and satisfying snack, often made with oats, nuts, and dried fruit.

data.name: macaron
data.description: Delicate French cookies with a crisp shell and soft interior, available in various flavors.

data.name: fruit cup
data.description: A refreshing mix of seasonal fruits, perfect for a light snack.

data.name: energy bites
data.description: Bite-sized snacks made with ingredients like oats, peanut butter, and honey, providing a quick energy boost.

data.name: yogurt parfait
data.description: Layers of creamy yogurt, crunchy granola, and fresh fruit.

data.name: rice krispies treat
data.description: A sweet, crispy snack made with puffed rice cereal and marshmallows.
